column2: Fertilizer maker Mosaic forecasts bigger-than-expected Q4 profitUPDATE 1-Fertilizer maker Mosaic forecasts bigger-than-expected Q4 profit Jan 19 U.S. fertilizer company Mosaic Co  on Monday estimated that it would post a larger fourth-quarter profit than expected and surpassed its targets for phosphate sales.
